plot: Ruben is a mature man who is terrified of marriage, while his girlfriend Isa, on the contrary wants to marry. Their lives will be altered with the arrival of Marcia, a girl of 15 who arrives from Paris and who happens to be the daughter of Ruben. With his arrival, Ruben begins to understand the importance of commitment. However, it is too late when he understand, then leaves him Isa. To avoid his friends and daughter, begins wild adventure to reconquer her.   Written by  Diego Alvarez
title: Ni te cases ni te embarques
